ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: We warmly thank all providers of the GBIF, OBIS-SEAMAP, NPPSD databases and Sébastien Descamps for access to the data set “Seabird colonies of the Barents Sea, White Sea and Kara Sea”. We also thank the French Polar Institute Paul Emile Victor for funding the ADACLIM program (IPEV program 388). Many thanks to Nicolas Courbin and Clara Péron for their advice. Finally, thanks to Junya Watanabe for insights on little auks in the Pacific Ocean.
